articles.title: Elon Musk’s xAI sues Apple and OpenAI over AI competition, App Store rankings
articles.summary: Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI sued Apple (AAPL) and ChatGPT maker OpenAI in U.S. federal court in Texas on Monday, accusing them of illegally conspiring to thwart competition for artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Elon Musk’s xAI sues Apple and OpenAI over AI competition, App Store rankings

articles.title: Elon Musk sues Apple, Sam Altman's OpenAI for allegedly colluding to crush xAI
articles.summary: Billionaire Elon Musk filed a bombshell lawsuit against Apple and Sam Altman’s OpenAI on Monday, accusing the two tech giants of illegally colluding to stifle xAI and other artificial intelligence rivals.

articles.title: Elon Musk’s xAI sues Apple and OpenAI, accuses them of conspiring to block AI competition
articles.summary: Elon Musk has taken his fight with Apple and OpenAI into the courtroom. On Monday, Musk’s AI startup xAI filed a lawsuit in a U.S. federal court in Texas, accusing the two companies of illegally conspiring to shut out competition in artificial intelligence, Reuters reported. articles.title: Saudi’s Humain Launches Arabic Chatbot With ‘Islamic’ Values
articles.summary: Humain, Saudi Arabia’s leading artificial intelligence company, has launched a conversational AI app for Arabs and Muslims as the kingdom seeks regional leadership in the technology.
articles.translated_title: Saudi’s Humain Launches Arabic Chatbot With ‘Islamic’ Values

articles.title: Can ChatGPT Help With Bill Negotiations? We Put It to the Test
articles.summary: I tried using artificial intelligence to help me negotiate utility bills and bank fees.

articles.title: AI plays an ever-bigger role on college campuses
articles.summary: While universities contemplate artificial intelligence use in the classroom, they are relying on the technology to cut down on operating costs and recoup staff’s time.

articles.summary: The CEOs at America's fastest-growing small businesses are overwhelmingly enthusiastic about artificial intelligence.

articles.title: This Bank Fired Workers and Replaced Them With AI. It Now Says That Was a Huge Mistake
articles.summary: Turns out, artificial intelligence may not always be as adept as some companies hope.
